channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
i need like npc codes because i have only like 10 and so theres no npc for example of codes (i will just copy pase the codes i have if you can help me get the other ones)
<npc><id>1</id><location><x>3424</x><y>3538</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3422</x><y>3536</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3421</x><y>3539</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3418</x><y>3537</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3415</x><y>3538</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3413</x><y>3535</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3409</x><y>3537</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3412</x><y>3539</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3410</x><y>3535</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3410</x><y>3532</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3421</x><y>3540</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1615</id><location><x>3422</x><y>3534</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1</id><location><x>3427</x><y>3539</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1</id><location><x>3426</x><y>3537</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>1</id><location><x>3430</x><y>3538</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>6267</id><location><x>2836</x><y>3431</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>322</id><location><x>2838</x><y>3431</y><z>0</z></location></npc> <npc><id>320</id><location><x>2841</x><y>3431</y><z>0</z></location></npc>
so thoes ones i got please help

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Theres Npc lists on runelocus lol. Here ill explain the code for you though:

Your Code:

<npc><id>1</id><location><x>3424</x><y>3538</y><z>0</z></location></npc>


The: 1

  • The “1” is the npc id of the npc you wish to spawn.
    Example: 50 is a Killer Black Dragon
    The: 3424
  • The “X” coordinate of the spawn location. For example when you look at your coordinates (should be a command like ::coord) it will say something like “2330, 2039, 0” The “2330” is your X-coord. So you would replace “3424” with “2330”
    The: 3538
  • The “Y” coordinate of the spawn location. For example when you look at your coordinates (example above) Your “Y” coordinate would be “2039” So you would replace “3538” with “2039”
    The: 0</npc<
  • Also known as the height level, your Z is either (0,1,2,3+) For the example above, your “Z” would be “0” if your on the ground floor (have not gone down/up ladders/stairs/ect) then the Z value will be 0.
  • Im assuming your using a 562 source. Need any help ask me, i know quite alot about them.

Read full topic
